entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023
